jobDescription: Senior Product Marketing Manager Our mission is simple: we want to set people free to do meaningful work. People love our products--and it turns out that people love working here too. If you are exceptional at what you do, then you deserve an exceptional place to work. And thats what Venafi is.  We want someone who can tell a strong story about the leader in Machine Identity Protection, who knows how to architect a message, and inspire people with an elegant interweaving of both words and ideas. You will leverage your innovative marketing techniques to help us create a new Machine Identity Protection market while simultaneously accelerating our growth. Combined with your deep understanding of the buyers journey, you will think strategically, define go-to-market activities with Machine Identity Protection messaging precision, and educate prospects, customers and partners on the unique value propositions of our solution. You must be a strategic thinker that understands how to communicate unique positioning to the market and is able to create compelling messaging that uniquely positions Venafi to support content generation activities, competitive analysis, and the creation and delivery of sales enablement assets. You must be self-motivated, proactive and comfortable working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.  The position requires strong marketing and communications skills, as well as an understanding of enterprise software, SaaS services, enterprise IT environments, and rapidly evolving security technologies. You must be comfortable working closely with sales, sales engineering, product management, and marketing, as well as bringing an exceptional solution that delights prospects, customers and partners. The position is based in the US and reports to the Director of Product Marketing. preferred, BA/BS requiredTravel:This position requires approximately 20% travelAbout Venafi: Venafi is the cybersecurity market leader in machine identity protection, securing machine-to-machine connections and communications. Venafi protects machine identity types by orchestrating cryptographic keys and digital certificates for SSL/TLS, IoT, mobile and SSH. Venafi provides global visibility of machine identities and the risks associated with them for the extended enterpriseon premises,mobile, virtual, cloud and IoT at machine speed and scale.
